welcomeText:
# I'm Dawid Horacy Golebiewski.

### Deep Tech Engineer passionate about all technology that removes unecessary work for humans and human lives easier. Talk to me about applied Machine Learning, Robotics and Blockchain Technology.

In my day to day I develop and implement automation for businesses in all industries. At night I facilitate, design and research at the intersection of Applied Machine Learning, Distributed Ledger Technologies and Decentralized Finance. 
 ### Relaunch coming end of May! Stay tuned!
title: Home
